events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund because this is not what I ordered.
The issue has been classified as a refund request based on the customer's report of receiving an incorrect item.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Sarah L. for resolution and further communication.
Hello! I’m Sarah. Sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 45321AB and attached is a picture showing the item I received, which is incorrect.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the refund and hope the process goes smoothly.
The refund case has been resolved and the refund process has been initiated as per customer confirmation.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and that everything is now satisfactory with your order.
Since the refund was successfully processed and confirmed, the case will now be formally closed. Thank you!
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to get your feedback about how your refund request was handled.
